Christian Kohlschuetter wrote:

> Hello,
>
> after crawling 8.5 million pages with the
> BroadScope/BdbFrontier/CachedBdbBigMap setup I mentioned in my mails 
> before,
> Heritrix' web server is not crawling and not responding for more than 24
> hours
>
> ...
>
> Unfortunately, I cannot diagnose further with JVM 1.4 (no JMX or jmap).
> Perhaps you know what's wrong or what I should do next.


I would suggest sending SIGQUIT to the launcher process ID to generate a 
ThreadDump to see what Heritrix is hung up on (i.e. '% kill -SIGQUIT 
LAUNCHER_PID').  Send it to the list if you'd like.

You might also read this section 1.1.1 of the release notes if you're 
running on linux: 
http://crawler.archive.org/articles/releasenotes.html#1_4_0_limitations.  
You may be experiencing a permutation on an issue we've seen here at the 
archive.

Yours,
St.Ack

>
> All the best,
>
> Christian
>
